values.name: KiwiOz Nannies Ltd
values.description:
KiwiOz Nannies is a leading International nanny agency specialising in permanent and temporary nannies. We supply full time and part time nannies either live in or live out as well as afterschool nannies, maternity nurses, and babysitters.  

We have a dedicated team of experienced consultants who work hard to source top candidates in a professional and timely manner.
KiwiOz Nannies has offices set up in London &, Brighton, UK, Sydney, Australia and Auckland, NZ.

values.name: Rangeview Library District
values.description:
Rangeview Library District is proud to serve the residents of Adams County through its seven Anythink libraries located in the communities of Bennett, Brighton, Commerce City, Northglenn, Thornton and the Perl Mack neighborhood of Denver. For community members outside of these areas, the district offers outreach services through its bookmobile, Anythink in Motion, visiting area schools and homebound residents.

Anythink is a new style of library - a place of unlimited imagination, where play inspires creativity and lifelong learning. Your community space where anything and everything is possible.

values.name: SportyCamps Ltd
values.description:
Hi, I'm Hadon Westerby, and I am the Program Director of SportyCamps Ltd.	
							
			SportyCamps grew out of a seed of an idea in the middle of 2009.
I established SportyCamps as a means of providing quality sports camp experiences for young boys and girls.	
							
			I am an experienced teacher and coach of a variety of sports, to range of ages and abilities. Originally from New Zealand, I completed my Sports Science degree, while playing age group rugby for Otago University and the Otago RFU.	
				Hadon Westerby - Program Director
				
								
			I then worked in, and managed the Hamilton YMCA before arriving in the UK in 2002. Since then, I have worked as a teacher at St Bede's School, teaching PE, rugby and cricket to school students. In my time there, 3 former students have gone on to play international rugby around the world. This adds to the long list of regional and international players I have worked with and coached in New Zealand.
								
			I also worked in New York for 6 months, with Mark Griffin, setting up Play Rugby USA - a charity that teaches rugby to school students in New York, and now across the USA.
								
			Currently I coach for the Harlequins rugby academy in Brighton, and for the Sussex U17 side. I am soon to complete my Level III RFU coaching qualifications.
								
			Finally, I also work as a referee and as a RFU Coach Educator in the local area.
							
		As you can see, I am very experienced in this field, and well qualified to operate SportyCamps.

Located in the Brighton and Howell Michigan area, the heart of Livingston county, TAB Massage and Fitness provides leading edge massage therapy, fitness training and nutritional counseling services. By offering a healthy alternative to medicine that focuses on muscle manipulation, relaxation techniques, nutrition guidance, and personal training, TAB Massage and Fitness is your one-stop mecca for alternative health and wellness. 

By focusing on deep tissue muscle therapy, stress relief therapy, and myofacial massage techniques, TAB Massage and Fitness can correct many degenerative ailments such as poor posture, poor flow of the lymphatic system, and overall general body aches and pains. Massage therapy is becoming widely popular as an alternative healing method to prescription drugs and surgeries. 

TAB Massage and Fitness is your destination to a happier healthier you by providing all the necessary tools, techniques, and education needed for a healthy lifestyle.
values.name: TAB Massage and Fitness, Inc.

RETAIL ORDERS:  The patented My Smart Snacker, SSP's flagship product, is now available for sale at the Suggested Retail Price of $14.99 each plus Shipping and Handling.

WHOLESALE ORDERS:  Smart Snacker Products LLC welcomes quote requests from Retail Stores for its products.  We do have a min. order quantity of two cases (24 units) for wholesale pricing.  Our product is shipped FOB: Brighton CO, 80602.

Liberty Chevrolet
values.description:
Liberty Chevrolet, located in New Hudson Michigan, 48165 with service to Detroit, is proud to provide for all your Chevy needs. Our dealership offers an online inventory of new and used Chevy cars, trucks and SUVs as a Detroit Chevrolet source in addition to being your hometown New Hudson Chevrolet dealer.

Looking for a used Chevrolet in Detroit? Perhaps you're searching for a new Malibu in Detroit or Benton Harbor. We are your Michigan Chevrolet dealer! Liberty is here to serve all your Chevy needs, so stop in today! Our location allows us to be your Detroit Chevrolet dealer. View our hours and location and see just how close New Hudson and Detroit are. Looking for a Chevy Malibu in Detroit? Perhaps Chevy trucks in Detroit are what you've been searching for. Your New Hudson Chevrolet dealer is nearby, and the inventory of new Chevrolet models at Liberty Chevrolet is definitely worth the drive!

As your Detroit Chevrolet dealership located in New Hudson, Liberty Chevrolet is proud to serve our hometown as well as Farmington, Brighton, Howell, Livonia and Detroit. Not convinced that we can be your Detroit Chevrolet dealer? Please take a moment to look at our inventory and contact us about a vehicle. We look forward to the opportunity to earn your business for a lifetime. 

Trouble finding us? We are located at 30400 Lyon Center Drive E in New Hudson, MI 48165.

values.name: Canyon sports
values.description:
Canyon Sports – Utah Ski and Snowboard Rentals

Utah is famous for having the world’s greatest snow, ski runs, and ski resorts. Along Utah’s Wasatch Range you’ll find excellent skiing for first-time skiers, novices, and experts. At Canyon Sports, we have been renting skis, snowboards, and related equipment to both locals and visitors from around the world. With ski and snowboard rental shops located throughout the Wasatch Front, our shops are found near Utah’s most popular ski resorts.

 

With retail locations in Sandy, Cottonwood, Salt Lake City, and Ogden, Canyon Sports has been in business for over 20 years providing the best deals on ski and snowboard rentals, discount lift passes, and anything else you need to hit the slopes. Whether you’re just taking a day off of work to unwind on the slopes or you’re taking your entire family skiing or snowboarding, we can set you up with everything you need at the best prices available.

 

Discount Lift Passes for Skiers and Snowboarders

Canyon Sports is the #1 discount lift ticket retailer in Utah. With discount lift passes available for all the major ski resorts in the state, Canyon Sports can help you get on the slopes for less money. Discount lift passes for ski resorts include Alta, Snowbird, Brighton, Solitude, Park City, Deer Valley, The Canyons, Snowbasin, Powder Mountain and Sundance.

Summer Mountain and Road Bike Rentals

During the off season, Canyon Sports operates Utah’s largest mountain and road bike rental fleet. Enjoy Utah’s excellent outdoor weather year round. During the summer, few sights are as beautiful as Utah’s mountains viewed from the seat of a mountain bike.
 

Canyon Sports also carries a variety of outdoor equipment. With over 15,000 products available, Canyon Sports has become a one-stop destination for outdoor enthusiasts across the Wasatch Front. Feel free to browse the site or drop by any one of our locations.

AERO ALLIANCE, an air charter / air taxi and aviation services company based in the south of England. 

We specialise in flying passengers and high priority cargoes to and from destinations in the UK, Channel Islands and mainland Europe.

AERO ALLIANCE was formed in 2008 to provide aircraft charter / air taxi and aviation services from its base at Shoreham (Brighton City) Airport, in the south of England, less than 30 miles (48 km) from London Gatwick.

The company is run and staffed by experienced charter pilots who specialise in flying passengers, patients and high-priority freight to and from destinations in the UK, the Channel Islands and mainland Europe.
Our aim is to deliver our customers or their freight as close to their final destination as possible, with minimum fuss and maximum convenience.

Our team also specialises in advanced flight instruction, aircraft management, fear of flying courses and aviation team building days.
values.name: Aero Alliance

values.description:
AVS Fencing Supplies are a specialist supplier of garden fencing, fence panels, railway sleepers, garden decking, timber decking boards, fence posts, driveway gates and security fencing. 

We deliver to Sussex, Surrey, Hampshire, Berkshire, Cambridgeshire and also parts of London, Essex, Lincolnshire, Northampton & Kent.

We currently supply a large range of fencing and landscaping materials from eight  AVS Fencing branch outlets, using a delivery fleet consisting of 7.5 tonne trucks, 16 tonne crane self offloading lorries and smaller pick ups. 

Branches are located at Henfield near Brighton, Milford near Guildford, Lewes, Rudgwick near Horsham, Peterborough, Wokingham near Reading, Harlow in Essex and Stansted near Portsmouth & Southampton in Hampshire.

You will find that AVS Fencing Supplies staff are both helpful and knowledgeable and can provide you with assistance and a free quote on a range of products, including garden fences such as fence panels, timber fence posts and concrete fence post, as well as used and new garden railway sleepers, deck boards, garden gates and steel palisade fencing to name a few.

Our fencing and landscaping materials are supplied to the general public, trade customers and commercial companies.

As a specialist fencing, railway sleeper, decking, & gate company, we have the expertise to help you with whatever your requirements may be.
values.name: AVS Fencing Supplies Ltd
Terre a Terre
values.description:
Terre à Terre was born, 17 years ago, out of a shared passion of two people with a mission, Amanda Powley and Philip Taylor. Classically trained as chefs and having cooked throughout the world, they wanted a platform for their innovative ideas where they could push the boundaries of traditional cuisine, while adhering to their beliefs in meat-free cooking.

What began as a BYO with 30 covers, supported by friends, family and the local Brighton community/growers and very lovely staff, (thank you), has become one the most exciting and successful restaurants in the UK. And we’re not just talking vegetarian restaurants, winning the title of 'Best for Vegetarian' - Observer Food Awards 2008 and continuously retaining the prestigious AA Two Rosettes and Michelin: ” Bib Gourmand” awards. First and foremost it is an establishment that serves outstanding food, and the fact that you won’t find meat on its menu is merely secondary.

Ultimately Terre à Terre is about quality ingredients served with flair, creativity and playful exuberance. 

Eating at Terre à Terre will stimulate your mind as well as your taste buds and we believe it will change the way you view vegetarian cuisine forever

All Hallows is an 11-18 Catholic mixed school and Sixth Form college situated in beautiful grounds on the borders of Surrey and Hampshire, midway between Farnham and Aldershot. Our school was opened in 1961, following the hard work and determination of the late Canon Daniel O'Hanlon, parish priest in Aldershot, with the support of local families, to ensure educational provision for Catholic families in the area.

The name All Hallows refers to all the Saints, all those who we believe have gone to be with God, and the superb sculpture above the main entrance was specially commissioned to reflect the school's name.

All Hallows has expanded ever since its opening, now serving a catchment area of some 400 square miles, and preparing to celebrate its Golden Jubilee in 2011-2012.  We provide Catholic education within the Diocese of Portsmouth, also taking a large number of pupils who live within the Diocese of Arundel and Brighton. Our school is founded on 'gospel values' and subject to availability of places, welcomes non-Catholic children whose parents wish to see them educated in a Christian environment.

Our Mission Statement reflects our aim to provide every child with the opportunity to develop their full potential in an orderly and caring atmosphere. The school is within the Surrey LA and has Specialist School status. We have been  a Technology College since 1995 and in September 2009 have been granted a second specialism as a Music College, in recognition of our achievements to date. We are also designated as a Lead School for Gifted and Talented students
values.name: All Hallows Catholic School
